PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Analyzing International Debt Statistics (IDS) from WorldBank
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: International Debt Statistics (IDS) presents statistics on the external debt and financial flows for the world’s economies from 1970 to 2017 for the most reporting countries. This dataset is originally collected to measure and monitor creditworthiness of its client. This project  uses  partial dataset to explore the debt statistics of developing countries and further analyze their economic conditions and their major loan purpose. This project is entirely conducted  using SQL.
